resources.string:
1. You are reading the help text for this test program. 
 2. Click the menu icon at top right to see a list of available menu items. 
 3. Click a dialog menu item to see that dialog. 
 4. In the emulator, you can flip the orientation using Ctrl+F11 to see if the dialogs work when the device is rotated.
Here is more help text that could be displayed to the user in a dialog. When the user clicks the Close button, the previous dialog is re-displayed to them.
